Rulings.Edison:
● Like all ignition effects, this card's effect can be activated whenever you summon a monster. When you summon Substitoad, you can activate its effect using your ignition priority. When the "frog" monster is summoned, Substitoad's effect can be activated again, using your ignition priority.
●The ② applies to both players' "frog" monsters. If "Treeborn Frog" attacks an Attack Position Substitoad, the Treeborn Frog is not destroyed by battle, but Substitoad is.
●Tributing a monster is a cost. If you Tribute "Dupe Frog", Dupe's effect can't be activated.
Rulings.Tengu: ● Like all ignition effects, this card's effect can be activated whenever you summon a monster. When you summon Substitoad, you can activate its effect using your ignition priority. When the "frog" monster is summoned, Substitoad's effect can be activated again, using your ignition priority.

Rulings.Cat:
● Tributing 1 monster you control is a cost.
● 'Substitoad's' effect can't be activated if you do not have any eligible 'Frog' monsters remaining in your Deck.

Rulings.Base: 1. Tributing 1 monster you control is a cost.\n2. The effect of "Substitoad" cannot be activated if you do not have any eligible 'Frog' monsters remaining in your Deck.

PSCT.Edison:
① You can tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 "Frog" monster from your Deck.
② "Frog" monsters can't be destroyed by battle.
PSCT.Tengu:
① You can tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 "Frog" monster from your Deck.
② "Frog" monsters can't be destroyed by battle.
